Authentic Caribbean Soul Food

Fresh ingredients, amazing spices and exotic influences.

Stir it up is a locally owned Authentic Caribbean Soul Food restaurant. Originally from St. Lucia, Chef/Owner Natalie Justin's menu features fresh ingredients, amazing spices and exotic influences.

11:00 AM - 6:00 PM

760A Yates Street Victoria, V8W 1L4
